articles.title: 'Strawberry Moon' in pictures: Major lunar standstill sees June's full moon hang low in the sky
articles.description: Last night's "Strawberry Moon" hovered lower in the night sky than it had done since 2006. Here are some stunning global snaps of June's full moon during the major lunar standstill.
articles.content:
The full "strawberry moon" rose over several iconic landmarks, including the Empire State Building in New York City.
